channel.title: Project Insanity ::commands
channel.description: It's been Awhile and yes I have googled. To make a command that is ::commads and it puts up an interface with words, then at the bottom of the words it shows something like qp123 and keeps going there is a way to use processes for it to auto clear so everytime you use that interface you only see the things you want... anyone know where that tut went to or know the code to clear it?

item.title: Project Insanity ::commands
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

sendFrame126("", #);

I know that clears a specific line on an interface, whether there’s a method that does this automatically I’m not sure

Read full topic
